headline: Gartner, Inc. (IT): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Gartner, Inc. (IT) on Substack by Bulls On Parade. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on IT. Gartner, Inc. (IT)’s share was trading at $429.79 as of March 25th. IT’s trailing and forward P/E were 26.86 and 35.34 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Gartner (IT) is a […]

headline: Esker Named a Leader in First-Ever Gartner Magic Quadrant for Accounts Payable Applications
summary: LYON, France & MIDDLETON, Wis. - Esker, the global authority in AI-powered business solutions for the Office of the CFO, today announced that it has been named a Leader in the 2025 Gartner Magic...
